mapper.insert: insert into crowdfund_organizer (ID, USER_ID, ORGANIZER_NO, ORGANIZER_NAME, ORGANIZER_INTRODUCTION, WEIBO_URL, TELEPHONE, THANK_YOU_NOTE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{organizerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{organizerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizerIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weiboUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thankYouNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update crowdfund_organizer
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORGANIZER_NO = #{organizerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORGANIZER_NAME = #{organizerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGANIZER_INTRODUCTION = #{organizerIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIBO_URL = #{weiboUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THANK_YOU_NOTE = #{thankYouNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update crowdfund_organizer set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORGANIZER_NO = #{organizerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORGANIZER_NAME = #{organizerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANIZER_INTRODUCTION = #{organizerIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIBO_URL = #{weiboUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THANK_YOU_NOTE = #{thankYouNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT CO.ORGANIZER_INTRODUCTION,CB.PROJECT_SYNOPSIS,CO.WEIBO_URL,CO.THANK_YOU_NOTE,CO.TELEPHONE FROM crowdfund_organizer CO,crowdfund_basicinfo CB WHERE CO.ORGANIZER_NO=CB.ORGANIZER_NO AND CO.ORGANIZER_NO=#{organizerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
